post:
I do not need this server anymore. Still remains one year of contract so I would like to sell it.

Server from Fortatrust. The URL is:

https://accounts.fortatrust.com/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0

Specifications:
- CPU: Dual Intel Xeon Quad Core
- Memory: 8GB
- Disk: 250GB
- Bandwidth: Unlimited

The price is $312/year. Also I have $87.40 of credit in the account. Total: $400, I sell it for $300.

I would change the email address to one from you, so you wil be the owner of the account.

Thank you.
